Serialized Form

  • Package <Unnamed>

    • Class Game

      class Game extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • correctAnswers
          ArrayList<Question> correctAnswers
          ArrayList of all the questions that were answered correctly
        • date
          String date
          Holds the date and time of when the game was started
        • name
          String name
          Holds the name of the user that played the game
        • questionsList
          ArrayList<Question> questionsList
          ArrayList, holds the chosen questions for this game
        • stage
          int stage
          Value of the index of current question
        • time
          String time
          Holds the date and time of when the game was started

    • Class GUI

      class GUI extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • actionListener
          ActionListener actionListener
          ActionListener object, used to detect button presses can be subclass mainMenuButtonListener or gameScreenButtonListener, depending on the stage
        • game
          Game game
          Pointer to Game object
        • panel
          JPanel panel
          JPanel object, used as the canvas for the GUI (every J element must be inside this)

    • Class Q_Art

      class Q_Art extends Question implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • fullOptionList
          ArrayList<String> fullOptionList
          ArrayList that holds all options. Because in Q_Art's easy mode we have to set Question's optionList to a sublist of all options, we need to make sure we don't lose that information in case we want to revert to hard mode, so a full copy o all Options is stored

    • Class Question

      class Question extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • correctOption
          String correctOption
          Correct option for the question (should be included in this.optionList)
        • description
          String description
          Actual text of the question
        • number
          int number
          Position of this question in the order of the game
        • optionList
          ArrayList<String> optionList
          List of options for the question
        • points
          int points
          Value of point this question is worth
